title: they should have bans for twisted tree line
body: well my thoughts that some champs are over powered in twisted tree line and they should have a 3 on 3 bans on their.

replies.body: This could be a decent idea with TT ranked got more popular! Take this idea over to the [**Gameplay **](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance)to see what the community thinks!
